attributes.action: inquiry into north south divide distribute monies more fairly
attributes.additional_details: can we please have an unbiased official inquiry into the north south divide spending tax payers monies across the country as not everything evolves around london and the south. we have suffered long enough in the north of watford ! our infrastructure and facilities are a disgrace dead end jobs not enough money is being invested in our areas please support this, our future is at stake all of us !
